full_text: Page 378 Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054 From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To Charisma Edge Lamine N'Diaye Shirley V. Skipper-Scott NYM/Executive Staff Date 2019/07/26 10:10 Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm Good morning all, Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances? Thank you, [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) > > [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @gmail.com> 7/26/2019 9:50 AM >>> Mr [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm. Thank you. [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Esq. 810 Seventh Ave., Ste. 620 New York, NY 10019 646-801 [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Page 1018 DOJ-OGR-00024876

text_blocks.content: From [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To Charisma Edge Lamine N'Diaye Shirley V. Skipper-Scott NYM/Executive Staff
Date 2019/07/26 10:10 Subject: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm
Good morning all, Epstein's attorneys are trying to get him his CPAP machine per our request. Can we have them hand-deliver it to medical staff as we have in previous instances?

> > [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @gmail.com> 7/26/2019 9:50 AM >>> Mr [b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Is Mr. Epstein approved to receive a CPAP machine? If so, should we send it directly to him through the inmate mail system? Please confirm.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as [b)(6); (b)(7)(C)]. The email discusses Jeffrey Epstein's request for a CPAP machine.
